alert.note: Alert for Northern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 8:13PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTAGE...TRUMBULL...MAHONING... GEAUGA...NORTHEASTERN CUYAHOGA...LAKE...STARK...EASTERN SUMMIT AND ASHTABULA COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM EST... At 811 PM EST, the public reported showers along a line extending from near Euclid to Streetsboro to Minerva. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Canton, Youngstown, Warren, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Conneaut, Salem, Ravenna, Columbiana, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, and Boardman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
